All unsaved changes will be lost. Are yo: All unsaved changes will be lost. Are you sure you want to leave this page.
Auto releasing pre-orders will find pre-: Auto releasing pre-orders will find pre-orders that have promise dates that have passed and release them from fulfillment.
Canceling this job will cancel this occu: Canceling this job will cancel this occurrence and all following occurrences. This job will have to be re-enabled manually to run it again.
Performing a hard sync from HotWax Comme: Performing a hard sync from HotWax Commerce to Shopify is useful for eliminating any discrepencies.
Re-allocation will re-allocate promise d: Re-allocation will re-allocate promise dates on all pre-orders based on upcoming inventory from purchase orders. Promise dates that were manually adjusted will be overriden.
Realtime adjustments allow HotWax Commer: Realtime adjustments allow HotWax Commerce to push new inventory to Shopify in realtime. These events include receiving , cycle counts, variances, and return.
Reserving inventory for completed orders: Reserving inventory for completed orders allows POS sales to accurately deduct inventory in HotWax Commerce.
Sorry, your username or password is inco: Sorry, your username or password is incorrect. Please try again.
Skipping will run this job at the next o: Skipping will run this job at the next occurrence based on the temporal expression.
Sync products and category structures fr: Sync products and category structures from Shopify into HotWax Commerce and keep them up to date.
This job schedule cannot be skipped: This job schedule cannot be skipped
This will automatically list items from: This will automatically list items from purchase orders for preorder when stock runs out.
Transfer pre-order related information t: Transfer pre-order related information to Shopify as tags and meta fields.
Unfulfilled orders that pass their auto: Unfulfilled orders that pass their auto cancelation date will be canceled automatically in HotWax Commerce. They will also be canceled in Shopify if upload for canceled orders is enabled.
When importing historical completed orde: When importing historical completed orders, this should be turned off.
When using HotWax BOPIS, Shopify isn't a: When using HotWax BOPIS, Shopify isn't aware of the actual inventory consumed. HotWax will automatically restore inventory automatically reduced by Shopify and deduct inventory from the correct store to maintain inventory accuracy.
